content:
### New features
This release introduces improvements to the execution lists. You can now save [Custom execution data](/workflows/executions/custom-executions-data.md), and use it to filter both the [All executions](/workflows/executions/all-executions.md) and [Single workflow executions](/workflows/executions/single-workflow-executions.md) lists.
* Add test overrides. * Core: Improve LDAP/SAML toggle and tests. * Core: Limit user invites when SAML is enabled. * Core: Make OAuth2 error handling consistent with success handling. * Editor: Fix ResourceLocator dropdown style.
